backend/main.mo: Motoko actor computing Nakshatras, determining the active Nakshatra and Pada for a given lunar longitude with validation and detailed degree calculations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing font‑revert related features, affected files, components, and associated test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file providing short descriptions of all major frontend components, pages, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entrypoint that loads the React application into the root div and imports main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app with ThemeProvider and Toaster components.
frontend/src/components/alerts/AlertsTog: Toggle switch component controlling Nakshatra alert notifications with icon feedback.
frontend/src/components/alerts/Nakshatra: Banner alert shown when a Nakshatra transition occurs, with dismiss action and transition details.
Dialog for selecting a city or using geolocation, with search, validation, and error handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Header with branding, navigation links, current city/time display, and access to city picker and alert toggle.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the main application layout with header, routed content, and footer.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Naksha: Renders a clickable card linking to a Nakshatra detail page with basic info and symbols.
Displays detailed Nakshatra information including symbols, traits, deity, themes, and padas in cards and accordions.
frontend/src/components/nakshatra/Transi: Calculates and displays upcoming Pada and Nakshatra transition times based on lunar movement and the user's timezone.
frontend/src/components/today/DailyInter: Shows daily interpretation content for a given Nakshatra, including emotional climate and a narrative summary.
frontend/src/data/cities.ts: Defines a list of world cities with names, timezones, and optional coordinates, plus the City interface.
Provides daily interpretation text for each Nakshatra, grouped into thematic sections.
frontend/src/data/nakshatras.ts: Defines Nakshatra structures with symbols, traits, deities, rulers, and pada breakdowns, exporting the full dataset.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCitySelection.ts: Manages the user's selected city with validation, localStorage sync, and local time updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication with login, logout, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocalStorage.ts: Custom hook that syncs state with localStorage across tabs and same‑tab subscribers.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraAlerts.ts: Tracks nakshatra changes and shows an alert banner when the current nakshatra differs from the last seen one.
frontend/src/hooks/useNakshatraNow.ts: Computes current lunar longitude for the selected city, validates it, and queries the backend for the current nakshatra.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines the nakshatra query using react‑query with validation, actor checks, and diagnostic logging.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables and base styles for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/astro/lunarLongitude.ts: Implements a simplified lunar longitude calculation normalized to 0–360 degrees.
frontend/src/lib/diagnostics/nakshatraDi: Provides helper logging for nakshatra query failures and a longitude validity check.
frontend/src/lib/nakshatra/index.ts: Helpers for generating and resolving nakshatra slugs from the dataset.
frontend/src/lib/time/timezone.ts: Time utilities for converting and formatting dates in arbitrary timezones.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/KnowledgeBasePage.tsx: Displays a searchable grid of all Nakshatras, filtering results by user query and rendering each item via NakshatraListItem.
frontend/src/pages/NakshatraDetailPage.t: Shows detailed information for a selected Nakshatra using its slug, including number, themes, and sectional content, with fallback if not found.
frontend/src/pages/TodayPage.tsx: Fetches and displays today's Nakshatra based on current city and lunar longitude, handling loading states, errors, and transition/interpretation components.
frontend/src/pages/TomorrowPage.tsx: Computes tomorrow’s lunar longitude for the selected city, queries Nakshatra data, and renders interpretations with error and loading handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current version, features, known issues, and architectural notes for the Daily Nakshatra app.
